entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight except gusting to 70 at times overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 8:21 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
